getSimulatedOrderMakerTransferResults(ad.details: Simulates the maker transfers within an order and returns the index of the first failed transfer.

params.order: The order to simulate transfers for.
params.takerAddress: The address of the taker that will fill the order.
params.takerAssetFillAmount: The amount of takerAsset that the taker wished to fill.

getSimulatedOrderMakerTransferResults(ad.return: The index of the first failed transfer (or 4 if all transfers are successful).

getSimulatedOrderTransferResults(address.details: Simulates all of the transfers within an order and returns the index of the first failed transfer.

params.order: The order to simulate transfers for.
params.takerAddress: The address of the taker that will fill the order.
params.takerAssetFillAmount: The amount of takerAsset that the taker wished to fill.

getSimulatedOrderTransferResults(address.return: The index of the first failed transfer (or 4 if all transfers are successful).

getSimulatedOrdersTransferResults(addres.details: Simulates all of the transfers for each given order and returns the indices of each first failed transfer.

params.orders: Array of orders to individually simulate transfers for.
params.takerAddresses: Array of addresses of takers that will fill each order.
params.takerAssetFillAmounts: Array of amounts of takerAsset that will be filled for each order.

getSimulatedOrdersTransferResults(addres.return: The indices of the first failed transfer (or 4 if all transfers are successful) for each order.
